claim: there be 3191 more people in attendance at the game versus dallas than at the game versus the la clipper

2. Second, identify the number of people in attendance at the game versus the LA Clippers (row 80) by finding the value in the "location attendance" column for that row. The value is "toyota center 18089".

4. Fourth, convert the numbers into integers for comparison by removing the "toyota center" part from each string and converting the remainder to an integer. The number of people in attendance at the game versus Dallas becomes 14898, and the number of people in attendance at the game versus the LA Clippers becomes 18089.
5. Fifth, perform the comparison by subtracting the number of people in attendance at the game versus the LA Clippers from the number of people in attendance at the game versus Dallas. The result is -3191 (since the number of people in attendance at the game versus Dallas is smaller).
6. Lastly, check if the claim "there be 3191 more people in attendance at the game versus dallas than at the game versus the la clipper" is TRUE or FALSE based on the comparison result from step 5. Since the result is -3191, which is not equal to 3191, the claim is FALSE.
